title: Caihong Xiong Zhi Jizhan Huanying Guai
synopsis: In the Emerald Bay at the end of the remote joyful jungle, there is a rainbow bear energy school in the deepest part, where cute, upright and kind rainbow bears live. In the days of studying in the "Rainbow Bear Energy School", the students constantly encountered mission challenges from Dr. Xiong and Professor Xiong, but the biggest enemy of the Rainbow Bear School, the "Phantom Monster", wanted to destroy the Rainbow Bear Energy School all the time. , The classmates battled wits with the phantom monster, turned the knowledge and skills learned into a weapon against the phantom monster, and finally guarded the Rainbow Bear Energy School. (translated from iqiyi)
